SELECT count(*) FROM sys990020 WHERE ISDELETE = 0
AND SITEID = 1
AND SITEID = #{siteid}
AND CODENAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{codename},'%')
AND CODEGRP LIKE CONCAT('%',#{codegrp},'%')

SELECT A.CODENO,A.CODEGRP,A.CODENAME,A.CODEVAL ,DATE_FORMAT(A.REGDATE,'%Y-%m-%d') AS REGDATE ,CASE WHEN A.ISDELETE = 0 THEN '사용' WHEN A.ISDELETE = 1 THEN '미사용' END AS ISDELETE_ ,A.ISDELETE ,A.UPPERCODEGRP ,B.CODENAME AS UPPERCODEGRP_ ,B.CODEVAL AS UPPERCODEGRP FROM sys990020 A LEFT OUTER JOIN sys990020 B ON B.CODENO = A.UPPERCODEGRP WHERE A.SITEID = #{siteid} AND A.CODENO = #{codeno}

SELECT A.CODENO,A.CODEGRP,A.CODENAME,A.CODEVAL , DATE_FORMAT(A.REGDATE,'%Y-%m-%d') AS REGDATE ,CASE WHEN A.ISDELETE = 0 THEN '사용' WHEN A.ISDELETE = 1 THEN '미사용' END AS ISDELETE_ ,A.ISDELETE FROM sys990020 A WHERE A.ISDELETE = 0
AND A.SITEID = 1 AND A.UPPERCODEGRP IS NULL
AND A.SITEID = #{siteid} AND A.UPPERCODEGRP IS NULL
AND A.CODENAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{codename},'%')
AND A.CODEGRP LIKE CONCAT('%',#{codegrp},'%')

SELECT CODEGRP, CODENAME, CODEVAL FROM sys990020 WHERE SITEID = 1 AND ISDELETE = 0
AND CODEGRP = #{value}
select CODEGRP from sys990020 WHERE SITEID = 1 GROUP BY CODEGRP
